scene.Shadow: I see the grassland and the natural setting in front of me. I have arrived in the region of Cindara. I heard that this is an area of peace and solitude for the most part. These people stayed out of the way of others as much as possible. Maybe, I will find reprieve here...

scene.Rin: Hi, are you a traveller? it is rare to see visitors in general here.
scene.Shadow: Yes, I have been travelling for a while, is there a town nearby?
scene.Rin: There is, I would be happy to guide you there!
scene.Shadow: That is much appreciated, I didnt get your name though?
scene.Rin: It's Rin, you?
Let us go then, Shadow?
scene.Shadow: Yes, I might just be on the verge of exhaustion.
scene.Rin: Alright, the village is just right of here then go up to reach there.
I thought you were in a hurry? Let's go! Just head right then up and we will be at the village
the town is just up ahead. Let us go
scene.Shadow: Something is coming from that bush!
scene.Rin: Let me give you a battle primer, just in case although i suspect you are a battle veteran anyway.
There are four commands : Attack, spell, Defend, Item.
Attack: A physical attack that is based on the character's Attack and is reduced by physical resistance and Defense
Spell: These range from healing to stats boosters or reducers or Damage skills which is the most common. Experiment and see what works for you.
Defend: Reduces damage by 33% of any attack done to character defending. Only applies to the first attack and not all attacks for that turn
Item: Use items for varying effects to turn the tide of battle. Feel free to use your items as you will get more as you go along.
With that said, I am sure you will figure out the rest! let us go!

I wonder what was that about...
scene.Shadow: Was that something normal around here?
scene.Rin: Yeah, around here anyway. I heard neighbouring towns have been experiencing strange attacks. Looks like it finally reached us.
What?!
scene.Shadow: Don't worry about it, do you know anything more about these strange attackers?
scene.Rin: ...Not much more. I need to talk to the mayor. let us go into the village.
